verses.roman:
eka-dina prabhu svarūpa-rāmānanda-saṅge
ardha-rātri goṅāilā kṛṣṇa-kathā-raṅge

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; svarūpa-rāmānanda-saṅge—with Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī and Rāmānanda Rāya; ardha-rātri—half the night; goṅāilā—passed; kṛṣṇa-kathā—of discussing Kṛṣṇa's pastimes; raṅge—in the matter.
translation: In the company of Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī and Rāmānanda Rāya, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu once passed half the night talking about the pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
